parameterdescription.para: Parameters handler
list of joints attached to the bridge
list of IMUs attached to the bridge
list of linear accelerometers attached to the bridge
list of gyroscopes attached to the bridge
list of orientation sensors attached to the bridge
list of magnetometers attached to the bridge
list of 6 axis force torque sensors attached to the bridge
list of 3 axis force torque sensors attached to the bridge
list of cartesian wrenches attached to the bridge
name of the joint
joint position in radians
time at which the measurement was received

briefdescription.para: Get all joints' positions in radians.

parameterdescription.para: all joints' position in radians
time at which the measurement was received

simplesect.para: the size is decided at the configuration and remains fixed, and internal checks must be done at the implementation level by the Derived class. This means that the user must pass a resized argument "jointPositions" to this method

parameterdescription.para: name of the joint
joint velocity in radians per second
time at which the measurement was received

briefdescription.para: Get all joints' velocities in rad/s.

parameterdescription.para: all joints' velocities in radians per second
time at which the measurement was received

simplesect.para: the size is decided at the configuration and remains fixed, and internal checks must be done at the implementation level by the Derived class. This means that the user must pass a resized argument "jointVelocties" to this method

briefdescription.para: Get IMU measurement The serialization of measurments is as follows, (rpy acc omega mag)

listitem.para: rpy in radians Roll-Pitch-Yaw Euler angles
acc in m/s^2 linear accelerometer measurements

mag in tesla magnetometer measurements
imuName
name of the IMU
imuMeasurement
imu measurement of size 12
receiveTimeInSeconds
time at which the measurement was received
true/false in case of success/failure

briefdescription.para: Get linear accelerometer measurement in m/s^2.

parameterdescription.para: name of the linear accelerometer
linear accelerometer measurements of size 3
time at which the measurement was received
name of the gyroscope
gyroscope measurements of size 3
time at which the measurement was received

briefdescription.para: Get orientation sensor measurement in radians as roll pitch yaw Euler angles.

parameterdescription.para: name of the orientation sensor
rpy measurements of size 3
time at which the measurement was received
name of the magnetometer
magnetometer measurements of size 3
time at which the measurement was received

briefdescription.para: Get six axis force torque measurement.

parameterdescription.para: name of the FT sensor
FT measurements of size 6 containing 3d forces and 3d torques
time at which the measurement was received

briefdescription.para: Get three axis force-torque measurement containing normal force (N) and tangential moments (Nm)

parameterdescription.para: name of the FT sensor
FT measurements of size 3 containing tau_x tau_y and fz
time at which the measurement was received

briefdescription.para: Get 6D end effector wrenches in N and Nm for forces and torques respectively.

parameterdescription.para: name of the end effector wrench
end effector wrench measurement of size 6
time at which the measurement was received

briefdescription.para: Helper method to maintain SensorBridgeOptions struct by populating it from the configuration parameters.

simplesect.para: the user may choose to use/not use this method depending on their requirements for the implementation if the user chooses to not use the method, the implementation must simply contain "return true;"

parameterdescription.para: Parameters handler
SensorBridgeOptions to hold the bridge options for streaming sensor measurements

briefdescription.para: Helper method to maintain SensorLists struct by populating it from the configuration parameters.

simplesect.para: the user may choose to use/not use this method depending on their requirements for the implementation if the user chooses to not use the method, the implementation must simply contain "return true;"

parameterdescription.para: Parameters handler
configured object of SensorBridgeOptions
SensorLists object holding list of connected sensor devices

briefdescription.para: Helper method to maintain SensorBridgeMetaData struct by populating it from the configuration parameters.

simplesect.para: the user may choose to use/not use this method depending on their requirements for the implementation if the user chooses to not use the method, the implementation must simply contain "return true;"

parameterdescription.para: Parameters handler
configured object of SensorBridgeMetadata
SensorLists object holding list of connected sensor devices
name of the joint
motor current in ampere
time at which the measurement was received

briefdescription.para: Get all motors' current in ampere.

parameterdescription.para: all motors' current in ampere
time at which the measurement was received

simplesect.para: the size is decided at the configuration and remains fixed, and internal checks must be done at the implementation level by the Derived class. This means that the user must pass a resized argument "motorCurrents" to this method
